duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide consultative service support to customers in a complex environment, addressing billing questions, policy changes, rate changes, and providing support for the Farmers.com/Mobile app.
Empower customers with insurance knowledge, identify gaps in coverage, upsell and cross-sell products, and retain customers beyond regular business hours.
Proactively share knowledge, develop effective communication skills, and hold expert knowledge of company products and services.
Analyze, clarify, and resolve intermediate policy and account related questions from internal and external customers, attaining performance level standards.
Continuously expand product/system knowledge by participating in insurance/industry related courses/seminars and staying current with relevant products.
Model Farmers' core values and perform other job-related duties as assigned.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or equivalent. Four year college degree preferred. Completion of required additional training.
